uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the project vacancy

project_id.description: Identifier for the project linked to the vacancy

start_date.description: Start date of the project vacancy

end_date.description: End date of the project vacancy

seniority_id.description: Identifier representing the seniority level required for the vacancy

position_id.description: Identifier for the position associated with the project vacancy

note.description: Any additional notes or comments for the project vacancy

custom_attributes.description: Custom attributes related to the project vacancy
